definitions.definition: A cycle with three wheels, powered by pedals and usually intended for young children.
An autorickshaw ; A motorized cycle rickshaw ( usually a roofed motorcycle with sidecar , often available for hire in the manner of a taxi )

main_definition: A cycle with three wheels, powered by pedals and usually intended for young children.
secondary_definitions: ( Philippines ) An autorickshaw ; A motorized cycle rickshaw ( usually a roofed motorcycle with sidecar , often available for hire in the manner of a taxi )
